commandDescription: Creates a custom label in the target org
fullnameFlagDescription: Name of the custom label (API Name)
languageFlagDescription: Language of the custom label (Default: en_US)
protectedFlagDescription: Protected State of the custom label (Default: false)
shortdescriptionFlagDescription: Short Description of the custom label
packageFlagDescription: The name of the package that needs to be appended
ignorepackageFlagDescription: Ignores the addition of the package into the fullname (API Name)
